message: When I come to, I'm lying on the sidewalk.
I slowly push myself up, fighting the pain in my body.
Though wobbly, I manage to stand.
Clutching my head, I struggle to make sense of my jumbled memories.
I was making a delivery... when suddenly, I got pulled into a Rhyme match, and then that weird guy with the rabbit head showed up...
How? What happened to my delivery?
I look around and see a furry blue lump on the ground.
I pick him up, but he doesn't respond.

name: 蒼葉
message:
"Hey!"

I tap him gently on the head.
After a beat, Ren opens his eyes. Relief washes over me.
The Rhyme battle must've damaged Ren too.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll take a look at you once we get home."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. It feels like some of my data's been corrupted too..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I remember fighting with that rabbit head guy, but what exactly happened at the end?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh... Hang on, maybe I can remember something."
Fighting through the pain in my head, I close my eyes and search my memories.
But the harder I try to remember, the more it slips out of reach.

name: 蓮
message: "If we value the average human male's mental storage capacity at 100, the value of yours would be―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is this really the time to be cracking jokes? ...Ah..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey... have you always had eight legs...?"
Which way is down...? I can't...
As Ren runs off, I start laughing.
